links.title: Peloton hires McKinsey to review cost structure; cycle maker may cut jobs, close stores
links.description: Peloton is working with the management consulting group McKinsey & Co. to review its cost structure and potentially eliminate some jobs, CNBC has learned. Job cuts were discussed in a recent call with members of Peloton's management team, according to a recording obtained by CNBC.

links.title: U.S. aims sanctions at pro-Russian separatists as Blinken plans Ukraine, Russia meetings
links.description: The U.S. is preparing financial sanctions on pro-Russian separatists in Ukraine as Secretary of State Antony Blinken heads to Europe to meet the Ukrainian leadership and his Russian counterpart, part of a show of diplomacy and pressure that Washington hopes will dissuade Russia from invading its neighbor, U.S. officials said.

$ARKK I am so curious to see what her strategy is from here.  She has to sell some to buy some.  Most of her stocks are painfully cut.  $TDOC is at 75.5-76.  Her average is now more than 170.  So where does she go to fix this?  She still has $HOOD it is also more than 50% off from her cost average.  Her genomic space purchase was too premature.
